Name: Bat Hotel
About the game: Bat Hotel is a casual game with agility and role-playing elements. Observe and then discover the movement patterns of different enemies and traps. You will control the movement of a magic perfume bottle to purify evil energy in a hotel attacked by dark forces and help all the hotel guests out of trouble. Press the key as fast as you can! [Background Story] As the most famous magician in the town, you were assigned to investigate a hotel in the outskirts of town. A group of girls traveling throughout this place wants to have a rest, but they are in trouble now. They need help immediately. Watch out, one of them is the incarnation of evil. [Game Features] -The attack speed depends on the speed of your keystrokes -Every normal hotel guests have 2 states of clothing -different enemy groups at each level -an atmosphere of horror -8 diffenrent characters for 8 battles
